title: Game freezes for a couple of seconds after Alt-tabbing
body:
Hey, lately I've been having some issues whenever I alt tab back in after tabbing out, the game just freezes for a second, like a black screen then it suddenly refreshes the game, like if I'm walking in game, it will look like I teleported but it's just this weird bug.
It doesn't happen with borderless only happens when using Full Screen.
Any help would be appreciated, I've tried reinstalling and repairing the client.

Thanks {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I'm with Blazingflares on this, as it sounds like your game is not only trying to re-render, but also catch up on all of the information that's been going on in the match while being tabbed out.  It might look like a fast forward of everything until it catches up.  I recommend using Windowed Fullscreen if possible.  It also wouldn't hurt to make sure that all of your [drivers are up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1) as well to make sure everything is running smoothly.  Hope that helps!

I think it's just the screen changing from the desktop to the game. Happens to me in a lot of games, that's why I usually always use borderless.

When you go from the desktop (with all the windows n crap) to the game (which is fullscreen) since the game screen isn't "open" like when you use borderless it has to load first, at least that's what I think is happening.
